## ThumbnailsOptions type

Plugin configuration options for the thumbnails plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ThumbnailsOptions = {
    backdropHeight: number;
    backdropMaxOpacity: number;
    backdropMinOpacity: number;
    spotlightHeight: number;
    sprite: string;
    vtt: string;
};
```
